snippet: The president announced the economic package during a meeting in Rancho Mirage, Calif., with King Abdullah II of Jordan.
abstract: Pres Obama arrives at Rancho Mirage, Calif, for a dinner meeting with King Abdullah II of Jordan, at which they are expected to discuss the civil war in Syria; Obama announces that the United States will renew a five-year program of aid to Jordan and promises $1 billion in loan guarantees.

byline.original: By SARAH WHEATON and MARK LANDLER
byline.contributor: Sarah Wheaton reported from Rancho Mirage, Calif., and Mark Landler from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The president announced the economic package during a meeting in Rancho Mirage, Calif., with King Abdullah II of Jordan.

headline.main: Obama Promises New Aid to Jordan in Refugee Crisis
headline.print_headline: Syria Is Expected to Be Main Topic as Obama Meets With King of Jordan
